statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({8.25}+{4.32}\right)}={25.14}\approx{25.14}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{4.32}\cdot{8.24}={35.5968}\approx{35.6}.
